svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.0.16 Chrome/132.0.6834.196 Electron/34.2.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.16" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="NextBuild" id="THCPn7DDvLEsuezVslI9"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="834" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="894" pageHeight="1280" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-0" /> <mxCell id="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-1" parent="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-0" /> <mxCell id="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-2" value="<p style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-weight: 400; text-align: start; margin: 0px;">terraform-aws-saa-c03-hands-on-app</p>" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;strokeWidth=2;shadow=1;fontColor=light-dark(#6e6868, #ededed);fontSize=16;startSize=36;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-1"> <mxGeometry x="12" y="194" width="870" height="510" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-4" value="" style="shape=image;html=1;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;imageAspect=1;aspect=fixed;image=data:image/svg+xml,;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-2"> <mxGeometry x="362" y="181.75" width="146.5" height="146.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPt_zML7MNIk5mBZgsqN-2" value="<div style="line-height: 100%;"><h3><font style="font-size: 20px; line-height: 100%;" face="Courier New"><b>REQUIREMENTS</b></font></h3><div><font><br></font></div><div style=""><ul style="padding-left: 30px; padding-right: 4px;"><li style="text-align: left;"><b style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="font-size: 14px;">No Server-Side Rendering (SSR):</font> <br></b><span style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;">The application cannot use getServerSideProps, as there is no Node.js server to execute this logic. The entire application must be pre-rendered at build time.<br><br></span></li><li style="text-align: left;"><b style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Static Site Generation (SSG):</font></b><span style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;"> <br>All pages must be built using Static Site Generation (SSG). Use getStaticProps to fetch and pre-render data during the build process. For dynamic routes, getStaticPaths is required to specify all possible paths.<br><br></span></li><li style="text-align: left;"><b style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Client-Side Data Fetching (CSR):</font></b><span style="font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;"> <br>For data that changes frequently, use Client-Side Rendering (CSR). API calls must be initiated by the browser after page load, typically within a useEffect hook, to fetch data from external services.</span></li></ul></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;perimeterSpacing=0;shadow=1;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-2"> <mxGeometry x="22" y="76" width="318" height="397" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPt_zML7MNIk5mBZgsqN-3" value="<div style="line-height: 100%;"><h3><font style="font-size: 20px; line-height: 100%;" face="Courier New"><b>REQUIREMENTS</b></font></h3><div><br></div><div style=""><ul style="padding-left: 30px; padding-right: 4px;"><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><b style="font-size: 14px;">API Routes are not supported: <br></b><font style="font-size: 12px;">The use of Next.js API Routes is not possible in this architecture, as they require a running Node.js server.<br></font><br></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><b style="font-size: 14px;">Client-Side Effects / Animations: </b><font style="font-size: 12px;">All animations, effects, and dynamic UI updates should be managed by JavaScript and CSS on the client side. Prioritize the use of CSS for a leaner application.</font><br><br></font></li><li style="text-align: left;"><font face="Courier New"><b style="font-size: 14px;">Use Relative File Paths: <br></b><font style="font-size: 12px;">Ensure all paths to assets (images, fonts, etc.) are relative to ensure they resolve correctly when served from the S3 bucket.</font></font></li></ul></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;perimeterSpacing=0;shadow=1;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="lz52879sirSJ25ZULbYc-2"> <mxGeometry x="528" y="76" width="318" height="397" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 868px; height: 1px; padding-top: 23px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #6e6868;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#6e6868, #ededed); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

p.style: white-space-collapse: preserve; font-weight: 400; text-align: start; margin: 0px;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 316px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Verdana"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

b.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

span.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;

li.span: The application cannot use getServerSideProps, as there is no Node.js server to execute this logic. The entire application must be pre-rendered at build time.

b.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

span.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;

li.span: All pages must be built using Static Site Generation (SSG). Use getStaticProps to fetch and pre-render data during the build process. For dynamic routes, getStaticPaths is required to specify all possible paths.

b.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

span.style: font-family: "Courier New"; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px;

li.span: For data that changes frequently, use Client-Side Rendering (CSR). API calls must be initiated by the browser after page load, typically within a useEffect hook, to fetch data from external services.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 316px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 534px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Verdana"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.font: The use of Next.js API Routes is not possible in this architecture, as they require a running Node.js server.
All animations, effects, and dynamic UI updates should be managed by JavaScript and CSS on the client side. Prioritize the use of CSS for a leaner application.
Ensure all paths to assets (images, fonts, etc.) are relative to ensure they resolve correctly when served from the S3 bucket.
